sentences.english: Barclaycard's Northampton office is the first to receive a CoLab space.
sentences.chinese: 巴克莱的北安办事处第一个接受了CoLab空间。

sentences.english: My transition team held videoconferences with each regional office.
sentences.chinese: 我的过渡小组与每个区域办事处举办了视频会议。

sentences.english: With the fast business expansion, we are inviting excellent candidates for positions.
sentences.chinese: 现因业务发展需要，诚邀优秀人员加盟北京办事处。

sentences.english: Set tables according to service standards.
sentences.chinese: 根据餐厅办事标准摆台。

sentences.english: Creation of the Eurasia World Scout Region, serving the 12 countries of the C. I. S .
sentences.chinese: 成立欧亚地区办事处，服务独立国协的12个国家。

sentences.english: A clerk thumbed through the files looking for a letter.
sentences.chinese: 办事员翻遍了案卷，寻找一封信件。

sentences.english: Our office is planning relocating in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 我们的办事处正在准备迁往上海。

sentences.english: Du Niang met with the woman shouted, Zuitian points good work.
sentences.chinese: 见了女的喊大娘，嘴甜点好办事。

sentences.english: In area under Kulun Amban's jurisdiction, the New Policy progressed much.
sentences.chinese: 库伦办事大臣辖区的新政进展较大。

sentences.english: Technically it's a 5-bedroom house plus an office.
sentences.chinese: 技术上，它是5家卧室加一个办事处。

sentences.english: She is very conscientious and never skimps through her work.
sentences.chinese: 她办事认真，从不敷衍了事。

sentences.english: German managers prefer to go by the book.
sentences.chinese: 德国的经理人更愿意按章办事。

sentences.english: She is very conscientious and never skimps her work.
sentences.chinese: 她办事认真，从不敷衍了事。

sentences.english: We must not act on assumptions.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能凭想当然办事。

sentences.english: The local office doesn't have the say about such matters.
sentences.chinese: 地方办事处对这类事没有决定权。

definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with
to be occupied with sth/to have sth on one's mind/there is something the matter
to behave oneself/to abide by the rules
to buy and sell/to do business/to trade/to deal
to cause trouble/to create a disturbance
to intercede/to plead for sb else
to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
